name: bj-cbveximi
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: mp2(wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1)), wal(s0, wex(s1, w2)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w2, wi(w0, w1)))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wal(s0, wex(s1, w2))
-| wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w2, wi(w0, w1))))
-| wi(wal(s0, wex(s1, w2)), wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w2, wi(w0, w1)))), wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wal(s0, wex(s1, w2))
-| wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w2, wi(w0, w1))))
-| wi(wal(s0, wex(s1, w2)), wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w2, wi(w0, w1)))), wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))))

body.origin:
|- wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w2, wi(w0, w1))))
-| wi(w2, wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wal(s0, wex(s1, w2))
-| wi(wal(s0, wex(s1, w2)), wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w2, wi(w0, w1)))), wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))))
-| wi(w2, wi(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wex(s1, w2)), wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w2, wi(w0, w1)))), wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
-| wal(s0, wex(s1, w2))
-| wi(w2, wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

comment: An equality-free general instance of one half of a precise form of ~ bj-cbvex . (Contributed by BJ, 12-Mar-2023.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
